items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: Ta5beesScript is an open-source, lightweight scripting language designed for clarity, expressiveness, and developer happiness. Built with Arabeezi syntax in mind, it blends humor, cultural relevance, and technical robustness to create a language that's not just fun but also functional and usable by Arabic-speaking programmers worldwide.
items.title: hkurdi/Ta5beesScript: Ta5beesScript is an open-source, lightweight scripting language designed for clarity, expressiveness, and developer happiness. Built with Arabeezi syntax in mind, it blends humor, cultural relevance, and technical robustness to create a language that's not just fun but also functional and usable by Arabic-speaking programmers worldwide.
